channel.title: Qft on Andrew Fowlie
channel.description: Recent content in Qft on Andrew Fowlie

item.title: Quantum Field Theory
item.description: QFT Kachelreiss, Quantum Field Theory: Lecture Notes Cvitanovic, Field Theory Srednicki, Quantum Field Theory Luty, Physics 851 Notes [hep-th/9912205] Fields Coleman, Video Lectures Serone, Notes on Quantum Field Theory Bourjaily, Symmetry factors [0607239] Topics in particle physics and cosmology beyond the standard model [1308.0025] Higgs mass naturalness and scale invariance in the UV Leibrandt, Introduction to the technique of dimensional regularization Lehnert, CPT and Lorentz symmetry breaking Furman, The Moller Luminosity Factor Gudrun, Introduction to Loop Calculations Abel, Anomalies course Supersymmetry [hep-ph/0505105] Supersymmetry and the MSSM: An Elementary Introduction [hep-ph/9510287] Supersymmetry: Where it is and how to find it [hep-ph/0108236] Supersymmetry Structure and Phenomena [hep-ph/0012288] Beyond the Standard Model (In Search of Supersymmetry) [hep-ph/9612389] Supersymmetry Phenomenology With a Broad Brush Sohnius, Introducing Supersymmetry [hep-ph/9709356] A Supersymmetry Primer [hep-th/0509029] 2004 TASI Lectures on Supersymmetry Breaking [hep-ph/9604232] Weak-Scale Supersymmetry: Theory and Practice [hep-th/9612114] Introduction to Supersymmetry [hep-ph/9604339] The Experimental Investigation of Supersymmetry Breaking [hep-ph/9611409] An Introduction to Supersymmetry [1010.
